siteMetadata.name: Ivan Novikov
siteMetadata.title: Ivan Novikov
siteMetadata.description: NYC-based solopreneur & freelance developer (full-stack, focusing on the front end)
siteMetadata.about: I like coding, and I'm especially happy when that means not actually writing code, but coming up with ways to achieve the end goals with less code and complexity. I have worked as a solopreneur building web apps from start to finish and thinking of the product as a whole, and I have also worked as a freelance developer focusing on what I'm best at, which is the front end. Feel free to reach out: Twitter DMs are open, and my email is on my GitHub profile.
siteMetadata.author: @ivan7237d
